document_data.name: Bryon Kendrick
document_data.mainbody: '''Bryon Kendrick''' was a member of the [[Kendrick]] family, the king of [[Corwell]] and father to [[Tristan Kendrick]].
document_data.Description: King Bryon was a strong man with dark hair and long black beard streaked gray.
document_data.Relationships: Adding to Bryon's despair, he was disappointed in the actions of his son, Prince Tristan.
document_data.History: Around [[1329 DR]], By [[1345 DR]], Bryon powerful presence had descended into a weakened state of discord.
